text: Shimbashi Station (新橋駅,しんばしえき) is a railway station of JR East, Tokyo Metro, Toei Subway, and Yurikamome in Tokyo. ==Neighbors== ;JR East :Keihin-Tōhoku Line : Rapid ::pass :Local ::Yūrakuchō - Shimbashi - Hamamatsuchō :Yamanote Line ::Yūrakuchō - Shimbashi - Hamamatsuchō :Tōkaidō Line ::Tokyo - Shimbashi - Shinagawa :Yokosuka Line ::Tokyo - Shimbashi - Shinagawa ;Tokyo Metro :Ginza Line ::Toranomon （G 07） - Shimbashi （G 08） - Ginza （G 09） ;Toei Subway :Toei Asakusa Line :Airport Expless ::Daimon （A 09） - Shimbashi （A 10） - Nihombashi （A 13） :Local ::Daimon （A 09） - Shimbashi （A 10） - Higashi-Ginza （A 11） ;Yurikamome :Yurikamome Line ::Shimbashi （U 01） - Shiodome （U 02） ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations in Tokyo Category:1909 establishments in Asia Category:1900s establishments in Japan
title: Shimbashi Station
